[Home](./index.md) &gt; [dynamic-forms](./dynamic-forms.md) &gt; [DynamicForm](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.md)

## DynamicForm interface

Describes a form that can render dynamically with the [DynamicFormComponent](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformcomponent.md) Creates a reactive form with visible fields to change the values of the form.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicForm<TForm, TFormState> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [controls](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.controls.md) | ([DynamicControlGroup](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolgroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt; \| [DynamicControl](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrol.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt;)\[\] | The form controls that make up the form |
|  [disabledControls?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.disabledcontrols.md) | [DisabledControls](./dynamic-forms.disabledcontrols.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of controls that should be disabled by default |
|  [getRawValue?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.getrawvalue.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to get the raw form value on submit. This includes the values of disabled controls. |
|  [initialValue?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.initialvalue.md) | Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TForm&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The initial form value |
|  [noRenderDisabledControls?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.norenderdisabledcontrols.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if disabled controls shouldn't be rendered. |
|  [onlineRequired?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.onlinerequired.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Should the form require the user to be online before submitting? |
|  [onSubmitFormatter?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.onsubmitformatter.md) | (f: TForm, s: Immutable&lt;TFormState&gt;) =&gt; Immutable&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that modifies the form value when submitted |
|  [resetState?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.resetstate.md) | Partial&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The form value that will be set on reset |
|  [resettable?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.resettable.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if the form should have a reset option |
|  [submitText?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.submittext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom text on the submit button |
|  [validators?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.validators.md) | ValidatorFn\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Validators for the form on submit |
